contents: 通过前面介绍的扩展点，我们可以与Select进行组合

highlighted.content:
import Input from 'kpc/components/input';
import {Select, Option} from 'kpc/components/select';

<div>
    <Input width="500">
        <b:prepend>
            <Select v-model="protocol" width="110">
                <Option value="http">http://</Option>
                <Option value="https">https://</Option>
            </Select>
        </b:prepend>
        <b:append>
            <Select v-model="domain" width="90">
                <Option value="com">.com</Option>
                <Option value="cn">.cn</Option>
                <Option value="org">.org</Option>
            </Select>
        </b:append>
    </Input>
</div>

import Intact from 'intact';
import template from './index.vdt';

export default class extends Intact {
    @Intact.template
    static template = template;

    defaults() {
        return {
            protocol: 'http',
            domain: 'com'
        };
    }
}

<template>
    <div>
        <Input width="500">
            <template slot="prepend">
                <Select v-model="protocol" width="110">
                    <Option value="http">http://</Option>
                    <Option value="https">https://</Option>
                </Select>
            </template>
            <template slot="append">
                <Select v-model="domain" width="90">
                    <Option value="com">.com</Option>
                    <Option value="cn">.cn</Option>
                    <Option value="org">.org</Option>
                </Select>
            </template>
        </Input>
    </div>
</template>
<script>
import Input from 'kpc/components/input';
import {Select, Option} from 'kpc/components/select';

export default {
    components: {
        Input, Select, Option
    },
    data() {
        return {
            "protocol": "http",
            "domain": "com"
        }
    },
}
</script>

import React from 'react';
import Input from 'kpc/components/input';
import {Select, Option} from 'kpc/components/select';

export default class Demo extends React.Component {
    constructor(props) {
        super(props);
        this.state = {
            "protocol": "http",
            "domain": "com"
        };
    }

    render() {
        return (
            <div>
                <Input width="500"
                    b-prepend={<React.Fragment>
                        <Select value={this.state.protocol} on$change-value={(c, protocol) => this.setState({protocol})} width="110">
                            <Option value="http">http://</Option>
                            <Option value="https">https://</Option>
                        </Select>
                    </React.Fragment>}
                    b-append={<React.Fragment>
                        <Select value={this.state.domain} on$change-value={(c, domain) => this.setState({domain})} width="90">
                            <Option value="com">.com</Option>
                            <Option value="cn">.cn</Option>
                            <Option value="org">.org</Option>
                        </Select>
                    </React.Fragment>}
                >
                </Input>
            </div>
        )
    }
}
